p: The transfusion group received platelet transfusion (n = 44), PRC transfusion (n = 03), FFP transfusion (n = 02), platelet plus PRC transfusion (n = 02) and platelet plus FFP transfusion (n = 1). The majority of transfusions (98%) occurred in 2010. The main laboratory and clinical indications are shown in Table 2.
